description:
Haruka`s father. He is a prominent scientist in the field of quantum physics and one of the founders of the Magic Circle Project, which aims to control the flow of spacetime. He is divorced from Asuka, Haruka`s mother, but still maintains a close relationship with Haruka.
After learning of the danger the Magic Circle Project poses, he joins Ryouko and Kyouji to try and stop its activation.
name: Mayuzumi Takuya
